titleStmt.title: Practica Plutarche the excellent phylosopher
De tuenda sanitate praecepta. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.

notesStmt.note: Contains most of chapter 2 and the final prescriptions of "The governaunce of good helthe", a translation of: Plutarch. De tuenda sanitate praecepta--STC.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Identified as STC 20073 on UMI microfilm, reels 139 and 932.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reels 139 and 932 (British Library copy).
